lead_paragraph: Brazilian federal police on Tuesday raided the offices of the consortium responsible for Olympic construction projects at the Deodoro site in northern Rio de Janeiro as part of a major corruption investigation.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Federal Police Raid Olympic Site in Corruption Investigation
headline.main: Brazil Federal Police Raid Olympic Site in Corruption Investigation
